title: Machinery Assembler Structure
description: Defines a multiblock structure for display in JEI

id.description: Unique identifier used for lang key, JEI category, and item registration

register-as-item.description: Whether to register this structure as an item in JEI for easy referencing

messages.description: Optional messages to display in JEI

item.description: Optional item to display with the message (format: 'modid:itemid' or 'modid:itemid@meta' or 'modid:itemid*count')

inputs.description: Mapping of single characters to block definitions

oneOf.description: Block ID with optional inline meta (e.g., 'minecraft:stone' or 'minecraft:wool@3')

id.description: Block ID with optional inline meta

items.description: Block ID with optional inline meta

shape.description: 3D shape definition: shape[y][z] = string of characters for x-axis row

items.description: A row of blocks along the x-axis. Use '_' for air/empty.
